title: Were Kentucky Couple Placed Under House Arrest for Refusing To Sign Quarantine Agreement?
subtitle: Elizabeth Linscott told a local news channel she didn't want to have to get approval before going to the emergency room. Court records reveal there was more to the story.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: A Kentucky couple were placed under house arrest in July 2020 after a woman diagnosed with COVID-19 refused to agree to self-isolate because it would require her to get prior approval to go to the hospital.
